mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT p.pre_name FROM student AS s LEFT JOIN sru_role AS sr ON s.uid = sr.uid LEFT JOIN role AS r ON r.rid = sr.rid LEFT JOIN role_perm AS rp ON r.rid = rp.rid LEFT JOIN permision AS p ON p.pid = rp.pid WHERE s.`name` = #{name} and p.pre_name is not null
mapper.update: update student set pass = #{pass}, salt = #{salt} where uid = {uid}
